hero.title: Comfortable and Well Connected Flats for Rent in Ashok Vihar Gurugram
description: Ashok Vihar Gurugram is a well-established residential locality known for its peaceful environment, good road connectivity, and proximity to key areas of the city. Tenants searching for a flat for rent in Ashok Vihar Gurugram are attracted to this location because it offers a balanced lifestyle with easy access to NH-48, Udyog Vihar, Cyber City, and other major employment hubs. The area is supported by schools, hospitals, local markets, banks, and daily convenience stores, making everyday life smooth and comfortable.

Flats for rent in Ashok Vihar Gurugram are primarily available in builder floors and low-rise residential buildings that focus on functional layouts, ventilation, and affordability. The locality suits families, working professionals, and long-term tenants looking for a stable and well-connected neighborhood. With steady rental demand, reliable infrastructure, and a settled residential character, Ashok Vihar continues to be a preferred choice for practical and stress-free rental living in Gurugram.

features.description: 8 Marla flats offer spacious interiors, improved natural light, and flexible layouts. These flats are preferred by mid-sized families who want additional room for comfortable daily living.

features.title: 10 Marla Plot Based Flats in Ashok Vihar

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Flats for Rent in Ashok Vihar Gurugram
faqSection.description: Detailed answers to help tenants make confident rental decisions.

faqs.question: Is Ashok Vihar Gurugram a good area for renting a flat?
faqs.answer: Yes, Ashok Vihar is a well-settled residential locality offering good connectivity, daily amenities, and a peaceful living environment.

faqs.question: What types of flats are available for rent in Ashok Vihar?
faqs.answer: Tenants can find builder floor flats in furnished, semi-furnished, and unfurnished options across multiple plot sizes.

faqs.question: Is Ashok Vihar suitable for families?
faqs.answer: Yes, the area is family-friendly with schools, hospitals, parks, and markets nearby.

faqs.question: How is connectivity from Ashok Vihar Gurugram?
faqs.answer: Ashok Vihar enjoys good connectivity via NH-48 and internal city roads, making commuting convenient.

faqs.question: Are rental flats in Ashok Vihar affordable?
faqs.answer: Compared to many prime locations, Ashok Vihar offers value-for-money rental options.

faqs.question: Are furnished flats available in Ashok Vihar?
faqs.answer: Yes, furnished and semi-furnished flats are available depending on landlord preferences.

faqs.question: Is parking available with rental flats?
faqs.answer: Most builder floors provide dedicated or shared parking facilities.

faqs.question: Do professionals prefer Ashok Vihar?
faqs.answer: Yes, professionals prefer Ashok Vihar due to its proximity to workplaces and smooth connectivity.

faqs.question: Does Deal Acres provide verified rental listings?
faqs.answer: Yes, all rental listings on Deal Acres are verified for authenticity and accuracy.
